perturbation.original_text: (b) "Company Intellectual Property" means all Intellectual Property that: (i) was owned or developed by Company prior to the execution of this Agreement; and (ii) is or was independently developed or acquired by Company without contribution or assistance from Reed's, Reed's Confidential Information, or Reed's Intellectual Property. Company Intellectual Property includes but is not limited to Company's know-how and independently developed recipes and alcohol beverage production processes, including the Company's proprietary composition of or recipe for the neutral alcohol beverage base that contributes alcohol to the Products ("Neutral Alcohol Beverage Base").
perturbation.changed_text: (b) "Company Intellectual Property" means some Intellectual Property that: (i) was owned or developed by Company prior to the execution of this Agreement; and (ii) is or was independently developed or acquired by Company without contribution or assistance from Reed's, Reed's Confidential Information, or Reed's Intellectual Property. Company Intellectual Property includes but is not limited to the Company's proprietary composition of or recipe for the neutral alcohol beverage base that contributes alcohol to the Products ("Neutral Alcohol Beverage Base"). The Company's general knowledge is excluded from this definition.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines 'Company Intellectual Property' broadly, whereas the modified version adds ambiguity by using 'some Intellectual Property' and excluding 'Company's general knowledge' creating uncertainty as to what specifically constitutes 'Company Intellectual Property.'

perturbation.original_text: (c) "Deliverables" means (a) any Recipe, (b) documentation, samples, prototypes and other tangible embodiments of or descriptions of Recipes, and (c) any other Intellectual Property created with during the term of this Agreement and required to be disclosed to the Development Committee as contemplated by Section 1(b) hereof.
perturbation.changed_text: (c) "Deliverables" includes (a) any Recipe, (b) documentation, samples, prototypes and other tangible embodiments of or descriptions of Recipes, and (c) any other Intellectual Property created with during the term of this Agreement and required to be disclosed to the Development Committee as contemplated by Section 1(b) hereof.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition for Deliverables is 'means' which shows a defined list. By changing it to 'includes' it can now mean there are more things that are not listed, leading to confusion and contradiction of what deliverables are.

perturbation.original_text: 4. Rights and Obligations. (a) The parties will collaborate to develop commercial production-ready Products according to the Specifications as may be developed by the Development Committee. Reed's shall have the right to visit the facilities used by Company to develop the Recipes and Deliverables, at such times as may be reasonably agreed to in advance by the parties. Company shall perform the work in connection with this Agreement in a timely, professional and workmanlike manner consistent with industry standards. Each party shall ensure that all persons performing work under this Agreement on its behalf shall have the requisite experience, training, skill and other qualifications needed to develop the Recipes, Deliverables and Specifications. Company shall keep the Development Committee informed of the progress of the development of the Recipes and Deliverables and such other matters as any member of the Development Committee may reasonably request from time to time.
perturbation.changed_text: 4. Rights and Obligations. (a) The parties will collaborate to develop commercial production-ready Products to meet business targets. Reed's may have the option to visit the facilities used by Company to develop the Recipes and Deliverables, subject to prior arrangement. Company shall perform the work in connection with this Agreement in an acceptable and functional manner. Each party shall ensure that all persons performing work under this Agreement on its behalf are suitable to develop the Recipes, Deliverables and Specifications. Company shall keep the Development Committee updated of the progress.
perturbation.explanation: The original text enforces the parties to work under the Specifications as developed by the Development Committee. The modified version allows for it to be developed on business targets, which can now contradict what has been agreed. It also contradicts the standards required and allows for it to be up to suitability.
